Do,es anyone here think that Bush is siding with big drug company's? Does any one here think that Bush is doing anything about the high cost of drugs for Americans. Does anyone here think he might be getting a kick back from these giants?

post_info.post_title: Is Bush siding with DRUG company's.

Big Orn

Are you referring to his billion-dollar (I think it’s like 40 billion) drug benefit plan? It may not be the best ever, but (using soft money as usual) it is the best offered to date.
 As far as a conspiracy in kick-backs – no, I don’t think so. This is a very high-profile, politically potent issue and all eyes are focused on it. If it even smelled funny the Dems would be all over it. Even though the president wants the government out of the drug business, I doubt there’s a hidden agenda there.
 
 Note: I refer to “soft money” here only because someone will have to initiate the plan and you and I will front that expense IMHO.
